original_text: He will bring down the high mountains and the highest hills. He will bring down the high mountains and the highest hills.
korean_text: 모든 높은 산과 모든 솟아 오른 작은 언덕과

sentences.original_text: He will bring down the high mountains

sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 가장 높은 언덕들도 낮추실 것이다

sentences.original_text: He will bring down the high mountains

sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 가장 높은 언덕들도 낮추실 것이다
